en: You've given this client exactly what they asked you for. However, now it seems they don't just want the product - they want you to implement it into their system, as well. You aren't sure you agreed to do the implementation, but you also aren't sure you were clear that the implentation wasn't included in the price.
You do the work, and the client pays you, no questions asked. You revise your website to make sure this miscommunication won't happen again.
The client explains that they thought implementation was included, and wouldn't have hired you if they knew it wasn't. Still, they pay you - though less than initially promised.
